text: Hini na nina bakholwayo musani ukusondela kwiSalâh nikwimeko yokunxila de niyazi into eniyithethayo naxa nikwimeko yokungahlambuluki12 ngaphandle kwamaxa nithabathe uhambo nisendleleni [kungekho manzi (okanye indlela yenu inqumla eMasjid] de nihlambe imizimba. Kanti ke xa nigula okanye niseluhambeni okanye omnye kuni uvela kuzikhulula kwindlu yangasese okanye benidibene (ngesondo) nabafazi, nize ningafumani manzi, yenzani itayammum ngomhlaba ococekiley, o nihlikihle ngawo ubuso benu nezandla, inene uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
